cast.overview: Alexey Zaitsev is a professional showman. Restless agent and endless activities further and further alienate Zaitsev from the beloved. But the main problem is that he's been lying to everyone all his life, since kindergarten. And once the showman decides to experiment, after which all and he begins to tell the truth…
cast.title: Zaitsev, burn! Showman history

cast.overview: Kevin Weekes chats with Alexander Ovechkin on his career and his historic goal scoring ability.
cast.title: GR8TNESS

cast.overview: For the first time in franchise history the Washington Capitals are Stanley Cup Champions.  NHL Original Productions provides an all-access pass behind the glass, on the bench and into the locker room as the Capitals embark on an unforgettable journey through the regular season and Stanley Cup Playoffs. Led by captain and Conn Smythe Trophy winner Alex Ovechkin, All-Star goaltender Braden Holtby and dynamic center Evgeny Kuznetsov, Washington defeated the Columbus Blue Jackets, the defending Stanley Cup Champion Pittsburgh Penguins, the Tampa Bay Lightning and the Cinderella expansion team the Vegas Golden Knights en route to hoisting the most coveted trophy in sports - the Stanley Cup  Exclusive interviews with players, coaches and Capitals legends provide an in-depth narrative of Washington's first championship. Experience this victorious season through the voices who ended a 44 year Stanley Cup championship drought in the nation's capital.
cast.title: Washington Capitals 2018 Stanley Cup Champions

cast.original_title: Alex Ovechkin: A Calder Trophy Tribute
cast.overview: Team released highlight video package from Alexander Ovechkin's Calder Trophy-winning rookie year.  Includes video of all goals scored, Calder Trophy award ceremony, NHL Network's top 10 goals segment, and in-game/TV video spots (including 2 on the Town with Matt Bradley at the DC car show and the shaving cream pie incident).
cast.title: Alex Ovechkin: A Calder Trophy Tribute

crew.overview: Johnny Barrett, a misguided and lonely soul, devotes his time to reading crime fiction novels in the hope that one day he might become one of the characters he reads about. While reading his favorite Mickey Spillane book, he falls asleep and dreams of a helpless girl in dire need of a hero. In his dream, he becomes the mighty John Baretta who looks danger in the eye and laughs. When he wakes, he finds a note in his book that says, "Remember me. They're gonna die. See me. Help me." Johnny sets out on a quest to find the dire maiden in his dream and save her from a criminal's grip. The story juxtaposes Johnny's actual blunder of an adventure with what he envisions in his mind to be this great caper that will prove he can be the stoic hero of the books he reads. Let's just hope Johnny can live up to the hype of his own mental status.
crew.title: Let Sleeping Guns Lie
